title: Witr in congregation - Assim al hakeem
transcript: I'm per se gibril says Salam aleikum is there any evidence that says a person is allowed to pray with your salah in jumeirah on regular on regular basis no on regular basis there isn't except when it comes to your family so we know that the Prophet I system used to pray a night prayer and Aisha would sleep in front of him and whenever he wanted to perform water he would wake her up so we know that he used to pray with his wives sallallahu wasallam also we know that he used to occasionally
